item.description:
The April 2009 meetup will feature a collaborative coding project at Betahouse. We'll project a laptop screen onto the Betahouse wall and develop a Django project from scratch. Feel free to contribute suggestions or just watch and learn from Cambridge Djangonauts.

If you are coming by car, you can park in the Green Street garage for $5. If coming by T, take the Red Line to Central Square and walk two blocks to 13 Magazine St. Buzz suite #2 and then walk up the stairs two flights.
item.name: Cambridge Django April Meetup
